SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as replyId
insert into seer_reply(reply_issue_id,reply_reply_id,reply_content,reply_user_id) values (#{replyIssueId},#{replyReplyId},#{replyContent},#{replyUserId})
mapper.select: select r.* , (select count(*) from seer_reply_praise where praise_reply_id = r.reply_id) as praiseNum , u.* from seer_reply r,seer_user u where r.reply_user_id = u.user_id and r.reply_issue_id = #{issueId} and r.reply_invalid = 0 order by r.reply_praise DESC , r.reply_time DESC limit #{star},#{end}
select count(*) from seer_reply where reply_issue_id = #{issueId} and reply_invalid = 0

select r.*, (select count(*) from seer_reply_praise where praise_reply_id = r.reply_id) as praiseNum , u.* from seer_reply r, seer_user u where r.reply_user_id = u.user_id and r.reply_invalid = 0 and r.reply_reply_id = #{replyId} limit #{star},#{end}
select count(*) from seer_reply where reply_invalid = 0 and reply_reply_id = #{replyId}
